cause.description:
Virginians for High Speed Rail (VHSR) is a private, not-for-profit 501 © (3), statewide education and advocacy group. We support modern higher speed passenger rail and transit solutions to relieve worsening highway congestion, to augment limited and costly air travel, and to overcome other inhibitors of regional competitiveness, convenience, and quality of life.
1. Improvement of Virginia's rail infrastructure for both passenger and frieght.
cause.mission: bring higher speed rail to Virginia
cause.name: Virginians for High Speed Rail
